text:
Reported by Mark DeSantis, JMSAppender does not configure correctly and gets
ignored by log4j as an invalid appender.
creator: psmith@apache.org
psmith@apache.org
text:
Changes in revision 374949 should fix this bug.  I have actually created a test
case using ActiveMQ that verified the bug and the fix, but I have not committed
this test case as yet without discussing the test and it's dependencies with the
rest of the log4j dev team.

I'm confident that your suggested changes have fixed the root cause.

cheers,

Paul
see Bug #38513 for the specifics of the suggested test case spawned from this issue.
creator: psmith@apache.org

text: *** Bug 40630 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: carnold@apache.org
